---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
convertMat2Rda <- function(mat_files) {
  for (i in mat_files) {
    print(i)
    alist <- readMatfile(i, verbose = FALSE)
    ulist <- unlist(alist)
    # print(names(alist))
    str(ulist)
  }
}
```


```{r}
v <- c("cereal.mat", "data.mat", "environmental.mat")
convertMat2Rda(v)
```
